title: You Mailing Milk - Featuring Tiffany "The Budgetnista" Aliche
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, Tiffany “The Budgetnista” Aliche stops by the Hot Button. We talk the looming recession, inflation vs price gouging, the dos and don'ts during an economic downturn, Wills and Trusts, and how to manage your grief while handling the finances of a loved one who has passed.

Important links mentioned during episode: 

http://getgoodwithmoney.com

http://mymentortiffany.com

http://thebudgetnista.com

Black Business of the Week - Mysa Fragrance Haus https://mysafragrancehaus.com/products/body-shimmer

Thank you to our Sponsors:

Target - When we invest in ourselves, we’re investing in what’s next for all of us. Stock up on Black-owned brands at Target. 

Follow us online:
 Twitter - www.twitter.com/friendzonepod Facebook - www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast Patreon - www.patreon.com/thefriendzonepodcast Discord - discord.gg/Jee2cwfAdz

Have a GREAT day!
